mapper.select: SELECT TBO.ID, TBO.MEMBER_ID, TBO.PRODUCT_ID, TBO.PRODUCT_COUNT, TBM.MEMBER_EMAIL, TBM.MEMBER_NAME, TBP.PRODUCT_NAME, TBP.PRODUCT_PRICE, TBP.PRODUCT_PRICE * TBO.PRODUCT_COUNT AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM TBL_ORDER TBO JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBO.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TBP ON TBO.PRODUCT_ID = TBP.ID WHERE TBM.ID = #{id} ORDER BY TBO.ID
